WorkItem.ClosedComment: I'm pretty sure the negative values have something to do with your Leaden Despair as you stack avoidance (or things that result in more avoidance) you are reducing your DamageTakePhysical's trigger requency.The other issues we can't help you with unless you are more specific. I know Shaz is still working on the model.
WorkItem.Description:
If I view stat values -> relative stat values on my DK, it shows a number of stats contributing a negative value to my survival. Notably strength, agility, dodge, and parry all _decrease_ my survival instead of increase it. Armor decreases my threat, which is just wrong since I have the talent to add armor to AP.  
 
Also, I feel like threat is over valued and mitigation stats are undervalued, though that may be a side effect of my relatively low gear level.
 
I've attached the file.
